snippet: Not only is the Mexican government not building a wall; it's spending $50 million to beef up its legal aid to migrants who fear deportation, a response to President Donald Trump's crackdown on illegal immigration....

headline.main: Secret Life of Tweets Undoes Celebrated Voice of French Suburbs
headline.print_headline: Secret Twitter Life Undoes a Star of France’s Suburbs

lead_paragraph: Not only is the Mexican government not building a wall; it's spending $50 million to beef up its legal aid to migrants who fear deportation, a response to President Donald Trump's crackdown on illegal immigration.
